Data Structures
Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
 CUART_Config_sUART Global configuration
 CUART_FxnTable_sThe definition of a UART function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific UART driver implementation
 CUART_Params_sBasic UART Parameters
 CUART_Transaction_sA UART_Transaction data structure is used with UART_read2(), UART_write2() and UART_Callback2()
